price: Dinlemedikleri halde; “İşittik” diyenler gibi de olmayın!
arabic: وَلَا تَكُونُواْ كَٱلَّذِينَ قَالُواْ سَمِعۡنَا وَهُمۡ لَا يَسۡمَعُونَ

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: walā takūnū ka-alladhīna qālū samiʿ'nā wahum lā yasmaʿūna
